key_title: Key to the genera of Salicaceae

breadcrumbs.key_title: Key to the main groups of plants in Victoria
Key to the families of Dicotyledons

source.author: Carr, G.W.; Walsh, N.G.
source.title: Salicaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: From: Carr, G.W.; Walsh, N.G. (1996). Salicaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves broadly elliptic to ovate, deltoid, rhombic or cordate, sometimes lobed, more than 5 cm wide; winter buds with several outer scales; catkin-scales laciniate or coarsely serrate
Leaves lanceolate, oblong or ovate to obovate, never lobed; winter buds with 1, rarely 2, scales; catkin-scales entire
